input_text:
Job Title: Oracle EPM Project Manager

Location: Batavia, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Description 

The client is currently leveraging Oracle Hyperion and only the consolidation module. They are upgrading to Oracle EPM and want to leverage the full suite going forward. They tried to kick this project off earlier in the year with a 3rd party called GenPact but it was a massive failure and they started over. Now RSM Consulting is doing the 6 week assessment phase that will then lead into the actual project over the next 1-2 years. This client needs someone who can be their conduit to the vendor and hold them accountable to timelines, cost and deliverables. They need to understand Oracle EPM and how to run a successful implementation. Must be a driver/proactive and not be someone who waits around for people to get back to them. Will consider this a fully remote, multi-year engagement.

 Skills 

Project management, Implementation, Oracle

 Top Skills Details 

Project management,Implementation,Oracle

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

The client is currently leveraging Oracle Hyperion and only the consolidation module. They are upgrading to Oracle EPM and want to leverage the full suite going forward. They tried to kick this project off earlier in the year with a 3rd party called GenPact but it was a massive failure and they started over. Now RSM Consulting is doing the 6 week assessment phase that will then lead into the actual project over the next 1-2 years. This client needs someone who can be their conduit to the vendor and hold them accountable to timelines, cost and deliverables. They need to understand Oracle EPM and how to run a successful implementation. Must be a driver/proactive and not be someone who waits around for people to get back to them. Will consider this a fully remote, multi-year engagement.

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

job_responsibilities: Be the conduit to the vendor
Hold the vendor accountable to timelines, cost, and deliverables
Be proactive and not wait for responses
